amendment.description: To appropriate funds for the Veterans History Project.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3051 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3051 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Boozman to Amendment SA 2910. (consideration: CR S4333; text: CR S4334) To appropriate funds for the Veterans History Project.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3051 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3051 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Boozman to Amendment SA 2910.
